summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEXUS Supply Chain OS. All 22 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with all components rendering correctly including WorldModel3D (Canvas 2D visualization), DecisionTimeline (with playback controls), and DemoWalkthrough (with section navigation).
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
GET /api/agents returns all 5 agents with correct structure
Individual agent endpoints (demand, procurement, logistics, risk, orchestrator)
Invalid agent returns 404
GET /api/metrics returns correct supply chain metrics
GET /api/blockchain/transactions returns 3 transactions
GET /api/quantum/optimizations returns optimization data
POST /api/quantum/optimize triggers new optimization
GET /api/risk/alerts returns 3 risk alerts
POST /api/command - system status returns agents component
POST /api/command - risk assessment returns risk-related components
POST /api/command - optimize routes returns logistics components
POST /api/command - blockchain ledger returns blockchain component
POST /api/command - timeline returns timeline component
POST /api/command - 3d digital twin returns world_model component
POST /api/command - demo walkthrough returns demo component
Homepage loads without errors
5 AI Agent cards display correctly with status, confidence, decisions count
Command interface accepts natural language input and returns responses
WorldModel3D component renders (Supply Chain Network visualization with Canvas 2D)
DecisionTimeline component renders with playback controls (play, skip, speed, filter)
DemoWalkthrough component renders with section navigation (8 sections)
Blockchain Settlement Ledger displays transactions with amounts and hashes
seed_data_creation: None - using mocked data from backend
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Backend uses GPT-5.2 via emergentintegrations for LLM command processing. WorldModel3D was rewritten from Three.js to Canvas 2D to avoid R3F errors. All AI agents, quantum optimizations, blockchain transactions are MOCKED data. LLM responses take 5-15 seconds.
mocked_apis_note: MOCKED: AI Agent data, Quantum optimization results, Blockchain transactions, Risk alerts, Supplier network data - all simulated in backend server.py
